mapper.select: select id, spell, meaning, passage_id, paragraph, question_num from internal_exams_passage_phrase where passage_id = #{passage_id} order by question_num, id
mapper.insert: insert into internal_exams_passage_phrase ( created, modified, spell, meaning, passage_id, paragraph, question_num ) values ( now(), now(), #{spell}, #{meaning}, #{passage_id}, #{paragraph}, #{question_num} )
mapper.update: update internal_exams_passage_phrase set modified = now(), spell = #{spell}, meaning = #{meaning}, paragraph = #{paragraph}, question_num = #{question_num} where id = #{id}
